item.title: Understand your website visitors with live web stats with GoSquared
item.description: I just started to use GoSquared this week – If you’ve got a high traffic website (well any website really) and want some real-time web analytics or insights – then you better get started with a FREE GoSquared account today. Using GoSquared I can watch as visitors come and go. Free Web Analytics & insights GoSquared monitors and analyses your website’s traffic in real-time – and you can watch all the action in the LiveStats console – which is like a 3 part Heads-Up Display.

item.title: ZOHO CRM just integrated with Google Sites
item.description: ZOHO CRMis one of the best web based SaaS customer relationship managementweb apps around and now its gone and made it even easier to capture your leads or enquiries from your website – if you use Google Sites.Currently Social CRM is the new name for managing customers – CRM wasn’t good enough and wasn’t work for many. The new tag Social CRM refers to engaging customers online where ever they are and hopefully that’s on your website!
